bibl.title: Letter from Rudolph Kleberg, Jr., to Howard A. Kelly, July 1, 1907

div1.p: Kleberg sends a contribution for Kissinger.

div1.head: Letter from Rudolph Kleberg, Jr., to Howard A. Kelly, July 1, 1907
div1.opener:
Rudolph Kleberg Jr.
ATTORNEY AT LAW
Yorktown, Texas,
July 1st, 1907.
ans
Mr. Howard A. Kelly,
1418 Eutaw Place,
Baltimore, Md.
My Dear Sir:-
div1.p:
My Aunt, Lulu Kleberg, directs me to send you $1.00 for the
benefit of and relief of Mr. John R. Kissinger. This is in response to
statement contained in the New York “Outlook”, issue June 29th. En-
closed find money order for above amount.
